select beanId, beanName, b.authorName, a.authorId, c.cateName, a.cateCode, publisher, publeYear, beanPrice, beanDiscount from kkb_bean a left outer join kkb_author b on a.authorId = b.authorId left outer join kkb_cate c on a.cateCode = c.cateCode
order by beanId desc limit #{skip}, #{amount}
select authorid from kkb_author where authorname like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select * from kkb_cate where cateCode > 100000 and cateCode < 200000
select * from kkb_cate where cateCode > 200000 and cateCode < 300000

select a.BEANID, a.BEANNAME, a.AUTHORID, b.AUTHORNAME, a.PUBLEYEAR, a.PUBLISHER, a.CATECODE, c.CATENAME, a.BEANPRICE, a.BEANSTOCK, a.BEANDISCOUNT, a.BEANINTRO, a.BEANCONTENTS from kkb_bean a left outer join kkb_author b on a.authorId = b.authorId left outer join kkb_cate c on a.catecode = c.catecode where beanid = ${beanId}
select beanId, beanName from kkb_bean where beanId = #{beanId}
select beanId, beanName, ratingAvg, (select cateName from kkb_cate where kkb_bean.cateCode = kkb_cate.cateCode) as cateName from kkb_bean order by ratingAvg desc limit 8
